item.title: SSL Connect Error on Git Fetch
item.description: 1~$ git fetch 2fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/icasimpan/example.git/': SSL connect error Fixed by: 1yum update -y nss curl libcurl

item.title: After Upgrading Ansible, pip had an issue SSL_ST_INIT
item.description: 1sudo apt-get remove python-openssl 2curl -o ./get-pip.py https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py 3sudo python2 ./get-pip.py Replace with yum if in RH-based OS. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43267157/python-attributeerror-module-object-has-no-attribute-ssl-st-init for details.
